definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: 10Shoppers looked for vegetables during a sale of produce from the city of Iwaki in Fukushima prefecture on April 12, 2011.

sentences.english: The Fukushima Daiichi plant has seven pools dedicated to spent fuel rods.

sentences.english: Evacuees from the area around the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Plant receive a meal at an evacuation center in Namie.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一核電站附近被疏散人員在疏散中心接受配餐。

sentences.english: Fukushima Mayor Ma Nan Sakurai wins extension phase, 17, says on the phone.
sentences.chinese: 福島縣南相馬市長櫻井勝延17日在電話裏如是說。

sentences.english: The storage pools for radioactive spent fuel at Fukushima have also posed a threat.

sentences.english: Fukushima Prefecture and the Japan Meteorological Agency has issued a tsunami warning, Ibaraki Prefecture.

sentences.english: He says the priority remains stabilising the nuclear reactors at Fukushima and restoring safety.
sentences.chinese: 他表示首要工作是穩定福島的核反應堆，恢復安全。

sentences.english: South Korea does not share a sea with Fukushima.
sentences.chinese: 韓國與福島並不在同一片海域。

sentences.english: In Minamisoma, in Fukushima Prefecture, 97 residents of aretirement home were found dead.

sentences.english: The danger has been caused by a new explosion at one of the reactors in the Fukushima plant, followed by a fire.
sentences.chinese: 危險起因於福島核電站一個反應堆的爆炸並起火。

sentences.english: It covered Pacific coastal areas of Iwate, Miyagi and Fukushima prefectures.
sentences.chinese: 它涵蓋的巖手縣，宮城縣和福島縣太平洋沿岸地區。

sentences.english: Prior to the Fukushima accident, the country had 54 functioning reactors.
sentences.chinese: 前福島事故，有54國運作的核反應堆。

sentences.english: Thank you for making a special trip to come and see us in Fukushima Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝您不久前專程前來福島縣看望我們。

sentences.english: Tsunami waves hit Japan's Miyagi and Fukushima prefectures, officials said.
sentences.chinese: 海嘯襲擊日本的宮城縣和福島縣，官員說。
